title: Weibo UGC Dataset Schema
description: Defines the structure of the Weibo UGC dataset, including post content, engagement metrics, and author details.

post_id.title: Post ID
post_id.description: Unique identifier for the Weibo post.

text_raw.title: Text Content
text_raw.description: Raw text content of the post.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Timestamp when the post was created (ISO format).

likes.title: Likes
likes.description: Total number of likes on the post.

engagement_score.title: Engagement Score
engagement_score.description: Computed engagement score combining likes, reposts, and comments.

pics.title: Pictures
pics.description: List of image URLs in the post.

author_id.title: Author ID
author_id.description: Unique ID of the post author.

author_name.title: Author Name
author_name.description: Display name of the post author.

verified.title: Verified
verified.description: Indicates if the author is verified.

followers.title: Followers
followers.description: Number of followers the author has.

hashtags.title: Hashtags
hashtags.description: List of hashtags mentioned in the post.

source_hashtag.title: Source Hashtag
source_hashtag.description: The trending hashtag under which this post was collected.

collected_at.title: Collected At
collected_at.description: Timestamp when this post was scraped (ISO format).
